aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Documentation
aiPowered.description: Transform any documentation into an intelligent assistant that understands context, provides accurate answers, and learns from your content structure.

instantSetup.title: 30-Second Setup
instantSetup.description: Simply paste your documentation URL. Our AI crawls, processes, and creates your assistant instantly without any complex configuration.

smartCrawling.title: Smart Web Crawling
smartCrawling.description: Automatically discovers and processes your entire documentation structure, following links and understanding site hierarchies.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Support users in their preferred language with built-in translation capabilities and cross-language understanding.

contextAware.title: Context-Aware Responses
contextAware.description: Advanced language models understand relationships between different parts of your documentation for more accurate answers.

unlimitedConversations.title: Unlimited Conversations
unlimitedConversations.description: Pro users get unlimited questions and conversations with no monthly restrictions or usage limits.

realtime.title: Real-time Processing
realtime.description: Instant responses powered by optimized AI processing and intelligent caching for lightning-fast performance.

customization.title: Custom Assistants
customization.description: Create multiple specialized assistants for different documentation sets, each tailored to specific domains or audiences.

embeddings.title: Advanced Embeddings
embeddings.description: State-of-the-art text embeddings ensure semantic understanding and accurate retrieval of relevant information.

smartParsing.title: Smart Document Parsing
smartParsing.description: Intelligently extracts and structures content from any documentation format, understanding context and relationships.

performance.title: Lightning Fast Search
performance.description: Advanced vector search technology delivers instant, relevant answers from your documentation in seconds.

reliability.title: 99.9% Uptime
reliability.description: Reliable infrastructure ensures your AI assistants are always available when your team needs them.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account and usage
settings.approachingLimitDescription: You're using most of your free questions. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited questions.

chat.freshConversationDescription: Each question is completely independent to ensure accurate answers directly from your documentation without any interference from past conversations.
chat.askAnything: Ask me anything about the documentation from {hostname}
chat.askQuestion: Ask a question about the documentation...
chat.monthlyLimitReached: Monthly limit reached - upgrade to Pro for unlimited questions
chat.assistantNotReadyLong: Assistant is {status}. Please wait for it to be ready before asking questions.

assistant.createDescription: Create an AI assistant trained on your documentation
assistant.deleteItem1: ‚Ä¢ The assistant and all its settings
assistant.deleteItem2: ‚Ä¢ All chat messages and conversation history
assistant.cancelDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel creating this assistant?

form.name: Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Brief description of what this assistant helps with...
form.crawlNote: The starting URL where we'll crawl your documentation

crawlExplanation.title: How the crawling works:
crawlExplanation.step1: We start from your URL and explore automatically
crawlExplanation.step2: We follow links going deeper (docs.com/guide ‚Üí docs.com/guide/setup)
crawlExplanation.step3: We don't go up to parent pages (docs.com/guide won't find docs.com/api)
crawlExplanation.result: Result: An assistant that knows all connected documentation from your starting point

freePlanLimits.title: Free Plan - Limitations:
freePlanLimits.specificSubpages: Specific subpages recommended: e.g. https://docs.convex.dev/functions instead of https://docs.convex.dev/
freePlanLimits.pageLimit: 30 pages limit: If you enter complete URLs, we'll only crawl the first 30 pages
freePlanLimits.depthLimit: Limited depth: Only 3 levels of subpages

assistant.errorSuggestion: You can modify the settings and try creating the assistant again, or delete it.

errors.monthlyLimitReached: Monthly question limit reached. Upgrade to Pro for unlimited questions.
errors.assistantLimitFree: Free plan limited to 3 assistants. Upgrade to Pro for 20 assistants.
errors.assistantLimitPro: Pro plan limited to 20 assistants total.
errors.upgradeToCreateNew: You need to upgrade to Pro to create new assistants.
errors.questionsExhausted: You've used all 20 free questions this month. You can no longer create new assistants or ask questions until you upgrade.
errors.networkError: Connection failed. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.crawlTimeout: Documentation crawling took too long. The website might be slow or have too many pages. Try using a more specific URL like /docs/getting-started instead of /docs.
errors.serverError: Server error occurred. Please try again in a few moments.
errors.systemError: We're experiencing a temporary issue with our services. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.
errors.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
errors.maxLength: {fieldName} must be no more than {count} characters
errors.validationFailed: Validation failed. Please check the URL format.

upgrade.description: You've reached your plan limit. Upgrade to Pro for more assistants and unlimited questions.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered Documentation
aiPowered.description: Transform any documentation into an intelligent assistant that understands context and provides accurate answers.

lightningFast.title: Lightning Fast Responses
lightningFast.description: Get instant answers from your documentation with our optimized AI processing and caching system.

naturalConversations.title: Natural Conversations
naturalConversations.description: Chat naturally with your documentation using advanced natural language processing.

freePlan.question: How does the free plan work?
freePlan.answer: The free plan gives you 3 AI assistants and 20 questions per month. Perfect for testing RefPaper with smaller documentation sets.

whatCounts.question: What counts as a 'question'?
whatCounts.answer: Each message you send to an AI assistant counts as one question. Follow-up questions in the same conversation also count.

upgradeDowngrade.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade anytime?
upgradeDowngrade.answer: Yes! You can upgrade to Pro anytime. If you downgrade, you'll keep Pro features until the end of your billing period.

documentationTypes.question: What types of documentation can I use?
documentationTypes.answer: RefPaper works with any web-based documentation including wikis, API docs, knowledge bases, and more.

sizeLimit.question: Is there a limit on documentation size?
sizeLimit.answer: Free plan: up to 30 pages per assistant. Pro plan: unlimited pages with advanced crawling capabilities.

enterprise.question: Do you offer custom enterprise plans?
enterprise.answer: Yes! Contact us for custom enterprise solutions with dedicated support, custom integrations, and volume pricing.
